Line 60: Line 60:
There are many other more unusual types of barometer. From variations on the storm barometer, such as the Collins Patent Table Barometer, to more traditional looking designs such as Hooke's Otheometer and the Ross Sympiesometer. Some, such as the Shark Oil barometer,<ref>Shark Oil Barometer [http://www.barometerworld.co.uk/articles.htm#sharkoil Barometer World] Retrieved on 2009-09-26.</ref> work only in a certain temperature range, achieved in warmer climates
There are many other more unusual types of barometer. From variations on the storm barometer, such as the Collins Patent Table Barometer, to more traditional looking designs such as Hooke's Otheometer and the Ross Sympiesometer. Some, such as the Shark Oil barometer,<ref>Shark Oil Barometer [http://www.barometerworld.co.uk/articles.htm#sharkoil Barometer World] Retrieved on 2009-09-26.</ref> work only in a certain temperature range, achieved in warmer climates

Gizmodo.com (2011-10-18). Retrieved on 2011-11-15.</ref>
